channel.title: PC gamer:The story of Half-Life remake Black Mesa
channel.description:
[url]https://www.pcgamer.com/the-story-of-half-life-remake-black-mesa/[/url]
I think I have read this before, but eh the big thing about this in my opinion is the xen concept art.
[img]https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/4M3aKcTx2WAnEz8ACVttPU.jpg[/img]

item.title: PC gamer:The story of Half-Life remake Black Mesa
item.dc:creator: k3nny1550
item.description:
Love that art, it infuses Xen’s design with a cleaner, almost Gieger-esque feel to it.

Read full topic
